title: (28890) Loeches - 8 Avenida de Clara Campoamor
description: Drinking water source.

title: (28890) Loeches - C. la Estrella
description: Small free parking next to a sports center and a park with camping tables. It is in a flat area and it is silent at night (during winter), although it must be taken into account that in the morning people come to use the facilities and more movement is heard.

title: (28813) Pozuelo del Rey - 17 Calle del Real
title_short: (28813) Pozuelo del Rey - 17 Calle del Real
description: Fairly large ground parking, with very cool playgrounds

title: (28510) Campo Real - 19 Carretera de Madrid
description: It is a small car park, but there is usually room, they have a great water fountain, there is a grill bar and a shop with many products from the area.

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - Ronda Sur
description: Parking very close to the iconic "Park of Europe", the site is very wide located on the outskirts of the city of Torrejón de Ardoz, in the park there are fountains and ponds. Depending on the dates, parking may be charged.

title: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - Cam. de los Tomillares
title_short: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - Cam. de los Tomillares
description: I found this place looking for a place away from large bottles and people at night on the weekend. The access road is very bumpy and there is a slope that requires a 4x4 or at least a vehicle with a rear lock.

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 7 Calle la Zarza
title_short: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 7 Calle la Zarza
description: Parking very spacious and bright, quite busy, I just arrived and I have some campers neighbors and a lot of cars.

title: (28803) Alcalá de Henares - 3 Calle del Río Bornoba
title_short: (28803) Alcalá de Henares - 3 Calle del Río Bornoba
description: Large supermarket parking lot near the Henares river

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 72M Calle Vial 8
description: Laundry

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 65 Avenida de la Cañada
title_short: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 65 Avenida de la Cañada
description: Self-service laundry

title: (28802) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Calle Antonio Mingote
title_short: (28802) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Calle Antonio Mingote
description: Water machine for payment. 1 euro 50 liters.

title: (28840) Mejorada del Campo - 3 Calle Argentina
description: Ideal parking to visit the Cathedral of Justo in Mejorada Del Campo. Famous for his Aquarius ad. Spectacular to see the building. The car park is large and great for RVs and Vans. The Police are right in front, so in theory it is a quiet and safe place. You can walk to the Cathedral and there is also a bike lane. Supermarkets, Gas Station, Burger next door. There is a charger for Electric Cars. Very good communication with Carreteras de Madrid such as the M50 or R3 and it is also next to Alcalá De Henares, which is also worth a visit!

title: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 32 Calle de Doctor Alcorta
title_short: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 32 Calle de Doctor Alcorta
description: Laundry on the same street you can not park but a couple of streets as leaving the town there is an esplanade where you can park without problem and from there to the laundry there is a 5 min walk I hope it helps

title: (28802) Alcalá de Henares - 33 Avenida del Ejército
title_short: (28802) Alcalá de Henares - 33 Avenida del Ejército
description: Excellent for parking and spending the night, except on Wednesdays from 06:00 to 17:00 H. Quiet place, gardens, public fountain, exercise machines, bars and restaurants everywhere, Mercadona, mechanical workshops, Ballena Oil gas stations , and, 10 minutes from the historic center.

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 7 Calle del Bronce
title_short: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 7 Calle del Bronce
description: Industrial estate, practically abandoned in the center of the city, by day some traffic and nearby is the train track but at night very quiet, ideal to spend the night without being disturbed and nearby there are supermarkets (Aldi, Lidl, Ahorramás and Mercadona, but beware, there is a bridge with height limit) Also nearby gas stations.

title: (28840) - 1X Diseminado Ferrocarril
description: Recreational park, shaded parking. Pass the Ave (train) nearby but not at night. trails next to the confluence of the Jarama and Henares rivers. Very close to Mejorada del Campo (connection between A-2 and M50, A-3, A-4 ...)

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 134 Avenida de la Constitución
title_short: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 134 Avenida de la Constitución
description: Huge public parking. Very quiet during the week to sleep, and a large number of supermarkets, bars, parks, groceries ...

title: (28802) Alcalá de Henares -
description: Compacted, leveled public parking lot. Right in front of a Mercadona, 10 minutes walk from the old town of Alcalá de Henares. Shell gas station 100 m. There are no prohibition signs to stay overnight.

title: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 1 Calle de la Viña
title_short: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 1 Calle de la Viña
description: Parking lot to sleep with a water source although many times it does not go there are also places to buy next to it, it is near the town square and then also next to it are the ponds a beautiful place to fish or hike, in the same parking lot is the park great for kids. On TUESDAYs on the closest side of the flats you cannot park because they put on a flea market.

title: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Calle Luis Gómez el Estudiante
title_short: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Calle Luis Gómez el Estudiante
description: Dead end street in quiet neighborhood 10 minutes walk from Calle Mayor. It is not specific to caravans. If you are lucky and you park, an ok place to visit the city.

title: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 19 Ronda del Henares
title_short: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 19 Ronda del Henares
description: Very spacious parking and no hassle, keep in mind that the market is set up on Mondays. Very close to the historic center, you can spend the night without problem, the municipal police are aware.

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 5 Calle de Arrope
title_short: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 5 Calle de Arrope
description: Quiet to spend the night, parks, supermarkets and bars quiet to spend the night

description: Full center of Alcalá. Restaurants, museums, etc. Ground parking. Free

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 4B Calle Meridiano
description: Very large dirt parking next to the fairgrounds, in December visiting the magical Christmas, very well. commuter station to go to Madrid next door. very calm. some truck and train, but acceptable noise. I would repeat.

title: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Plaza de la Juventud
title_short: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Plaza de la Juventud
description: Ground parking area. Next to a park. Safe zone.

title: (28806) Alcalá de Henares - Paseo de los Pinos
title_short: (28806) Alcalá de Henares - Paseo de los Pinos
description: Parking near the park. Well located for visiting the historic center, there is a drinking fountain and utilities. It's a quiet cul-de-sac. Station at 700m.

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 4 Calle Brasil
description: Place to park. It is generally empty of cars and calm.

title: (28850) Torrejón de Ardoz - 4 Calle Madrid
description: Speed Queen laundry

title: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Calle Sociedad de Condueños
title_short: (28804) Alcalá de Henares - 1 Calle Sociedad de Condueños
description: Parking day and night. Quiet and quiet.

title: (28500) Arganda del Rey - 2 Poligono Vp. Norte Poligonos
title_short: (28500) Arganda del Rey - 2 Poligono Vp. Norte Poligonos
description: Good and quiet place to spend the day, good price, 8 euros during the week and 14 on weekends (Saturday Sunday). They allow animals. Option to take you to the metro to go to Madrid. It is parking for caravans, motorhomes and trucks.

title: (28806) Alcalá de Henares - 102 Avenida Miguel de Unamuno
title_short: (28806) Alcalá de Henares - 102 Avenida Miguel de Unamuno
description: Laundry point you can park, and buy at the supermarket. All together

title: (28500) - 16D Diseminado Cm de Alcala
description: It's a fairground car park, great to spend a night on your trip with the motorhome or camper if you are very tired. It is a quiet area where you can go unnoticed.

title: (28806) Alcalá de Henares - s/n Calle Octavio Paz
title_short: (28806) Alcalá de Henares - s/n Calle Octavio Paz
description: Laundry with pet wash. Easy parking. McDonald's and supermarkets next door

title: (28806) Alcalá de Henares - Unnamed Road
description: Carrefour parking. It is giant, very bright and far enough away from the main road (A2) so that the noise of cars is not heard.

title: (28830) San Fernando de Henares - 2 Avenida de San Sebastian
title_short: (28830) San Fernando de Henares - 2 Avenida de San Sebastian
description: Perfect parking to visit Madrid, without services, next to San Fernando Metro entrance, next to the park, bar 50 meters away, daytime aircraft noise, at night.

title: (28805) Alcalá de Henares - 34 A-2
description: Shopping center where you can shop and leave your clothes washed. Parking next to the entrance, which is where the laundry is.

title: (28806) -
description: Quiet place, and a park to be able to walk

title: (28514) Nuevo Baztán - 17 Avenida Frankfurt
description: Location for emptying black and gray water and filling with water.

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 153 Avenida Campillo de San Isidro
title_short: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 153 Avenida Campillo de San Isidro
description: Signposted area for motorhomes. Quiet

title: (28861) Paracuellos de Jarama - 7 Calle de los Galgos
title_short: (28861) Paracuellos de Jarama - 7 Calle de los Galgos
description: Parking for long term departures (paid). Near the airport. Secured and safe. 15 minutes by taxi to Terminal 4.

name: Parque Las Eras
title: (28514) Parque Las Eras
description: New free pitch, very large undivided pitches, with litter bins, benches, next to the municipal winery, landscaped and a few meters from the Goyeneche Palace. Nuevo Baztan is one of the most beautiful cities in Spain. There are good restaurants, supermarkets, a tourist office, an interpretation center, a park with games and picnic tables.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 2V Ronda Gijón
description: Place to park  day and night. Children's playground 20 meters from the parking lot. Commercial center with toilets, supermarket and bars.There are many areas like this in the whole municipality of Rivas Vaciamadrid

title: (28514) Nuevo Baztán - 2 Travesía José de Churriguera
title_short: (28514) Nuevo Baztán - 2 Travesía José de Churriguera
description: It is a very large esplanade of grass. It is at the exit of the town but in two minutes you are in the center. It is a very small but beautiful town. Very quiet to sleep.

title: (28514) Nuevo Baztán - 6 Calle Transformador
description: Fully leveled gravel pit. You can get water from the fountain in the Plaza del Secreto, two blocks away.

title: (28522) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 12 Calle José Luis Sampedro
description:
Very quiet area, next to the usual parking area for neighboring motorhomes. Glued to the local police with surveillance cameras in the area.
the water fountain works in summer
Litter bins.
A restaurant next door and a cafeteria/teteria.
Buses next door and metro 5 min with large parking.
Large motorhomes enter, it is usually free, if it is full in the vicinity there is always room.

title: (28522) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 340 Calle de Junkal
description: Zone indicated to park day and night. Without services.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 691 Paseo de las Provincias
description:
Location reserved for vehicles other than cars, several other locations along this walk
200 meters from the Madrid Metro. ATTENTION: buy a combined ticket. shopping center at 500mts.

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 10 Calle Thomas Edison
description: Decathlon parking very quiet. We were also parked during the day and everything was perfect.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 2T Calle Pamplona
description: Big parking lot all along the road right next to the metro station. Day and night allowed. We slept for one night without a problem and left our van in the day to go into Madrid. Parking spaces are about average length. We could fit our 6 meter van in a space. Might struggle if you’re longer.

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 3V Lugar Parque Rivas
description: Asphalt and dirt parking without prohibition sign no height bar, trees for shade. Next to Carrefour and other stores. No services. Restrooms in the mall.

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - Autovía del Este, 581
description: Small parking lot, easy access from the highway but almost no noise. Feels like you’re in nature but still very close to the city. Walking routes right by, so great if you have a dog. Didn’t stay overnight but didn’t see any signs prohibiting it.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 3 Plaza de Blas de Otero
title_short: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 3 Plaza de Blas de Otero
description: Laundry open until 10 p.m. every day

title: (28522) - 1A Lugar Parque Rivas
description: Discreet parking next to the FeuVert del Carrefour, it is not so busy, employees' cars usually park, the parking lights turn off at 23:23, bathrooms inside the carrefour. I have not been disturbed at any time. Well clean area. Wifi inside the carrefour.

title: (28822) Coslada - 42 Calle de Luis Braille
description: Near the municipal sports center La Via

title: (28817) Los Santos de la Humosa - Camino del Manso
title_short: (28817) Los Santos de la Humosa - Camino del Manso
description: We tried the place 300m further up but then found this, it is more flat and quieter, further from the big main dirt road, better for our dog and the kids, still some cyclists and I guess a bit muddy after heavy rain. only 10 min drive from autovia, 5 km of that good enough dirt track

title: (28512) Villar del Olmo - 1 Calle de la Fuente
title_short: (28512) Villar del Olmo - 1 Calle de la Fuente
description: Nivalado land clearing where you can park to see the town or do some route around. Nearby there is a fountain and wastebaskets. We don't sleep even though it seems like a quiet place

title: (28042) Madrid - 2B Calle Ezequiel Peñalver
description: Next to the highway. A bit noisy.

title: (28817) Los Santos de la Humosa - Calle Capitán Francisco Fuentes
title_short: (28817) Los Santos de la Humosa - Calle Capitán Francisco Fuentes
description: We arrived by a path with big ruts. So for 4x4. That said nice place near Madrid.

title: (28500) Madrid - 4X Diseminado Cr M 3020
description:
A well equipped and little crowded lagoon. Daytime only. Large AC fits well in the parking lot. Good place to spend the day or to rest. You pay €1 to enter and enjoy the picnic tables, the play area and bathroom. There is a restaurant/cafeteria (in it the toilets). Great place for a break near Madrid. Outside the enclosure there is a place to park and possibly spend the night (we did not stay).
Be careful when entering because you pass the Laguna sign (it is half covered with vegetation) and then when you go down the hill it seems that it is closed but there is a small door to the left of the gate.
In the parking lot there are more than 40 spaces and around 30 tables inside (not all of them have shade)

title: (28818) Santorcaz - C. de la Manuel de Falla
title_short: (28818) Santorcaz - C. de la Manuel de Falla
description: Dehesa de Santorcaz Grove with picnic tables and benches. There is a highway nearby, but it doesn't have much traffic. In the middle of nature, without services. Good access from the road, we traveled with a VW and without problems.

address.street: C. de la Manuel de Falla

title: (28821) Coslada - 5 Calle Alejandro Goicoechea
description: Public parking near the "El Humedal" park without services, ample parking, quiet, well lit and located in a quiet and safe area.

title: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 2 Calle de la Ronda del Arroyo
title_short: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 2 Calle de la Ronda del Arroyo
description: Fountain next to easy parking area (except market Sundays)

address.street: 2 Calle de la Ronda del Arroyo

title: (28816) Camarma de Esteruelas - Vereda de Camarma al Puente de Zulema
title_short: (28816) Camarma de Esteruelas - Vereda de Camarma al Puente de Zulema
description: Quiet place among pine trees, away from the town, you spend the night at ease, with very nice views, there is a fountain with drinking water and the occasional bench. The road is dirt, with some potholes but it is reached without problem. Without a doubt, the best place in Camarma and surroundings, including Alcalá de Henares.

address.street: Vereda de Camarma al Puente de Zulema

title: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 14 Calle de Valtibañez
title_short: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 14 Calle de Valtibañez
description: Parking in front of the Paracuellos local police. After the roundabout, there is more parking.

title: (28816) Camarma de Esteruelas - 6 Calle los Depósitos
title_short: (28816) Camarma de Esteruelas - 6 Calle los Depósitos
description: Parking for one night. Very quiet, with mount on the right side (to walk the dogs). The garbage is very close. I put it because I see that there are not many places to spend the night.

title: (28817) Los Santos de la Humosa - 5Z Paseo de la Visera
title_short: (28817) Los Santos de la Humosa - 5Z Paseo de la Visera
description: Mirador at the top of the village. very nice view in the morning, overlooking the city of Madrid and Guadalajara. there is room with some trees still bordering a small road. we slept 1 night in a van. No toilets but fields nearby...

title: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 2 Camino de Servicio
title_short: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 2 Camino de Servicio
description: Long-stay parking for motorhomes, with a security guard and security cameras, you cannot stay overnight.

title: (28880) Meco - 32A Calle Pinar
description: Water fountain in a children's play park with parking lots all around. ideal for filling water bottles and jerry cans

title: (28042) Madrid - 510 Avenida Almanaque
description: Parking in Barajas without gauge.

title: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 5 Calle de las Huertas de Abajo
title_short: (28860) Paracuellos de Jarama - 5 Calle de las Huertas de Abajo
description: Very close to the center of Madrid. Bus and Subway. In-person and camera surveillance

address.street: 5 Calle de las Huertas de Abajo

title: (28032) Madrid - 83 Calle de Villablanca
description: Secure parking is near the police station

title: (28042) Madrid - 22 Calle de Ayerbe
description: Large free car park, very well lit. Metro 10 minutes, Place Sol 40 minutes. Terminal T2 20 mins walk. Close to Mc Donalds, Repsol, friendly staff, very helpful, professional and efficient. Many bars, restaurants, cafeterias and shops. Very quiet at night and quite busy in the morning. Flight and airport personnel park there. There is therefore constant movement and police rounds. *** no parking Friday evening-late Saturday evening it is market day ***

title: (28031) Madrid - 19 Carretera Madrid a Rivas Jarama
title_short: (28031) Madrid - 19 Carretera Madrid a Rivas Jarama
description: It is a Repsol gas station. It closes early and has a good flow to refill water.

title: (28880) Meco - 414 Poligono Unidad 24
description: Free municipal parking in the town of Meco. flat, plenty of parking, and quiet at night. near the church.

title: (28022) Madrid -
description: Parking WANDA METROPOLITAN

title: (28051) Madrid - 34I Autopista M-50
description: Parking with hotel and restaurant. Possibility to eat or just park. Car wash present.

title: (28022) Madrid - 177G Calle de Sofía
description: Very quiet neighborhood and 200 meters from the metro station, the road can be heard a little, but it's fine, I would go back.

title: (28032) Madrid - 32 Calle Jardín de la Duquesa
title_short: (28032) Madrid - 32 Calle Jardín de la Duquesa
description: Quiet zone, the access is done by one of its zebra crossings

title: (28022) Madrid - 4 Calle Uno
description: Drinking water source

title: (28051) Madrid - 38C Poligono UZP0103 Ensanche Vallecas
description: Good place to spend a night. Quiet and without noise. There is a cafeteria next door for breakfast, 100% recommended.

title: (28022) Madrid - 47 Paseo de Ginebra
description: In this avenue you can stay, there is hardly any noise. Good shade trees. Ideal for seeing a show at the Civitas Metropolitano. There are sources to drink. 2 Mercadonas less than 10 min.

title: (28022) Madrid - 26K Calle de Estocolmo
description: Parking in a quiet street with some shade, next to trees and well leveled. If you arrive the day before, ideal place to attend an event in Wanda, source and playground. Metro station at 100 m, next to the Green Ring to travel Madrid by bike

title: (28042) Madrid - 45 Calle de la Playa de Riazor
title_short: (28042) Madrid - 45 Calle de la Playa de Riazor
description: A public bathroom and free parking next to the Barajas metro stop, very busy but perfect for not entering the city by car

address.street: 45 Calle de la Playa de Riazor

title: (28550) Tielmes - 1 Calle Carretera de Villarejo
description: Parking of the sports center and the pool. Swing area, futsal and basketball. We have stayed overnight and nobody told us anything. Good area for cycling and hiking in Via Verde.

title: (28042) Madrid - 11 Calle de la Bahía de Cádiz
title_short: (28042) Madrid - 11 Calle de la Bahía de Cádiz
description: Water Dispenser in Park next to playground.

title: (28530) Morata de Tajuña - 34 Calle de José María Rodelgo
title_short: (28530) Morata de Tajuña - 34 Calle de José María Rodelgo
description: Parking for swimming pools, with trees, a cafeteria and a playground. Small vehicle only.

title: (28814) Daganzo de Arriba - Camino de Camarma del Caño
title_short: (28814) Daganzo de Arriba - Camino de Camarma del Caño
description: It is a picnic area with good shade and tables to eat, we do not know if there is the possibility of spending the night, it is in the middle of the ZEPA area with a multitude of birds for nature lovers, There is a nearby river where you can at least refresh your feet

title: (28031) Madrid - 62G Calle del Barranco del Novillo
title_short: (28031) Madrid - 62G Calle del Barranco del Novillo
description: It is a street of a park, near the subway, the squares are large and wide. Ideal for sleeping in squares that are located between two tall buildings of ORTIZ. Near the LA GAVIA subway station and the shopping center of the same name that is reached on foot.

title: (28550) Tielmes - Calle del Cercado
description: Perfect place to rest, you can do simple hiking and cycling routes

title: (28037) Madrid - 107 Avenida de Guadalajara
description: Overnight parking, no service, next to metro and restaurants

title: (28032) Madrid - 5 Avenida Comunidades
description: Quiet and secluded place, with a public toilet nearby.

name: Camping Osuna
title: (28042) Camping Osuna
description:
Nuevo Camping Osuna, next to El Capricho Park is the only campsite in the city of Madrid. Ideal for visiting the city, a 7-minute walk from the Madrid metro, with a direct line to Gran Via (25min). Open all year long. Emptying of black and gray water only for lodged clients. Bakery, minimarket, cafeteria, Wi-Fi room...etc.
Food trucks, music and a pleasant nightlife.

title: (28051) Madrid - 52 Avenida de la Gavia
description: Fountain next to playground

title: (28051) Madrid - 109 Calle del Rayo Vallecano de Madrid
title_short: (28051) Madrid - 109 Calle del Rayo Vallecano de Madrid
description: Ample parking to spend the night, very quiet area in the Vallecas neighborhood, it does not have any service except for some bins.

address.street: 109 Calle del Rayo Vallecano de Madrid

title: (28042) Madrid - 51 Avenida de Logroño
description:
Common parking with an avenue next to it and a park, very useful to spend a night.
With a metro station 5 minutes walk away, perfect for visiting the center.

title: (19200) Azuqueca de Henares - 6 A-2
description: Gas station, 24 hour cafeteria. Water and WC 24 hours free. No electricity Without shade. A bit noisy due to traffic. Truckers rest area. Large esplanade. Supermarket

title: (28032) Madrid - Blvr. de Jose Prat
description: We discovered this place through a blog. It is free and you can stay overnight. Apparently there are always motorhomes parked here. We spent one night and everything was fine. Safe. It has a shopping center in front and the neighborhood is quiet with large parks.

title: (28031) Madrid - 31 Calle Muela de San Juan
title_short: (28031) Madrid - 31 Calle Muela de San Juan
description: Large and comfortable area to park, close to shops and metro line 1 to be able to move to the center. Quiet and guarded area are main streets with influence, but the parking lot is a service area next to it

title: (28042) Madrid - 53-71 Calle Villamiel de Cáceres
description: In the streets around the lots very quiet. no problem to park the camper, come in the evening because during the day filled with cars of people who work in the city, metro 2 minutes to the city, direct line 5. Osuna campsite 500 meters away for water and drainage, already mentioned.

title: (28530) Morata de Tajuña - 3 Plaza de Francisco González
title_short: (28530) Morata de Tajuña - 3 Plaza de Francisco González
description: Flat city parking and big mega. If you go to the bottom of the car park, you can go up to land on the grass. Hyper calm. No services but when, like us, we do not need it, it's great!

title: (19162) Pioz - 1 Camino del Castillo
description: Castillo de Pioz Ideal to stop to rest or eat. I don't know if overnight stays are allowed. With trees around the castle, shadows and concrete benches overlooking the fields of Pioz. The castle is open to the public abroad, if you want to visit you must contact the town hall. There are no services of any kind, but there are containers, a gas station and a supermarket right next door.

title: (28031) Madrid - 17 Calle del Congosto
description: A laundry at a good price to do the laundry. Parking a bit complicated.

title: (28580) Ambite - 441 Camino de Valdemera
description: Quiet site next to the Tajuña river and at the end of a green lane.

title: (19200) Azuqueca de Henares - Av. de Alcala
title_short: (19200) Azuqueca de Henares - Av. de Alcala
description: Coin-operated laundry, you can park about 2 motorhomes right in front of the door and be calm, there is a gas station next door, it stands out that it has adblue and butane bottles, but not propane

title: (28032) Madrid - Autovía del Este
description: Cepsa gas station.

title: (19200) Azuqueca de Henares - 15 Calle Miguel Delibes
title_short: (19200) Azuqueca de Henares - 15 Calle Miguel Delibes
description: Asphalted parking, within the village, lots of parking and level. Very good location to know the town, there are bike paths to go with children and countless parks. From September 10 until the end of September you cannot park for fairs.

title: (28042) Madrid - 5 Glorieta Su Alteza Real Don Juan de Borbón
title_short: (28042) Madrid - 5 Glorieta Su Alteza Real Don Juan de Borbón
description: Free parking, only for the day, near IFEMA, near the Metro and Juan Carlos I Park, very pleasant to walk. There are large parking spaces.

address.street: 5 Glorieta Su Alteza Real Don Juan de Borbón

title: (28042) Madrid - 112 Calle Vía Dublín
description: Online parking next to IFEMA, with a subway at 200m, is between the IFEMA pavilion and a golf course. Car and truck parking place.

title: (28051) Madrid - 24 Calle Villamanta
description: Highly recommended climbing wall, with plenty of space to park the motorhome.

title: (28055) Madrid - 1 Avenida Hispanidad

It is a dirt car park with very little unevenness. good for fall - winter - spring, no big trees yet and no cover from the sun. being from land there is a lot of dust and having the windows open is a disaster

title: (28055) Madrid - Av. de las Fuerzas Armadas
title_short: (28055) Madrid - Av. de las Fuerzas Armadas
description: Parking very close to Ifema, perfect for the Mad Cool Festival (5 to 10 min walk from the entrance). A few trees create shade, and a large public park is a 2-minute walk away with very clean toilets open during the day (go to the second brown hut, the 1st is a technical room). There is something to walk around and games for children. Tap with drinking water. Despite the festival, we were only a few Vans and CCs on this huge parking lot, so all very well-off and spaced out. For light sleepers, bring earplugs for the return walk of festival-goers, but the road is closed to traffic so perfect for the night.

title: (28038) Madrid - 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
title_short: (28038) Madrid - 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
description:
In this street there are usually large parking spaces next to Parque de las Tetas (Cerro del Tio Pio), from where you have magnificent views of Madrid and the sunset. It has no shade and is not flat.
There is a free public toilet next door.
There are also several fountains, one of them in the children's area next to the viewpoint bar, although there are several more throughout the park. Next to it there are also some calisthenics bars to exercise.
It is in the Vallecas neighborhood, so relatively close you can find all kinds of establishments. It is about a 15-minute walk from the Nueva Numancia metro, which in 10 more minutes leaves you in the center of Madrid.

address.street: 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala

title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 16 Calle de Concha Espina

title: (28046) Madrid - 2A Calle Tulipan
description: Free gravel parking used by locals. It's a little hard to find the right entry. It seems unregulated but everybody uses it and you won't get a ticket. The entry roads are VERY bumpy with lots of potholes, it gets better inside the parking and it's worth it, you won't find a free parking as well situated in Madrid. It's very close to one of the main train stations (CHAMARTIN) and bus stations (PLAZA DE CASTILLA) and there are bars and supermarkets all around. It's also unusually silent for it's location appart from the rush hours where people parks in our out to go to work/home. I asked around and everybody said that it was a very safe place to park as well.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 40 Calle Extremadura
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 40 Calle Extremadura

title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 12 Calle Andalucía
